name: Zane Ma
content: Zane Ma Assistant Professor Oregon State University School of EECS 2019 Kelley Engineering Center Corvallis, OR 97331 zane.ma@oregonstate.edu Students PhD üßô Peƒëa Despotovic Masters ü§ì Lucas Stephens Elliot Foley Derek Greene Andrew Le Undergrad üê£ Jacob Porter Teaching Winter 2025: CS/ECE 478 - Network Security Fall 2024: CS499/579 - Empirical Computer Security Fall 2023: CS499/579 - Empirical Computer Security News Nov. 2025: Received DARPA subcontract for Web3 cyberthreats! Aug. 2025: Interviewed by KEZI about DDoS-related news. July 2025: APT lifecycle paper accepted to RAID 2025! June 2025: Alexis successfully defended her MS thesis! May 2025: Lucas and Ksenia defended their HC theses! May 2025: Paper on orphan flows accepted to TMA 2025! Mar. 2025: Derek defended his HC Thesis! Jan. 2025: Teaching revamped CS478 course. Aug. 2024: TPC for 2025 ACM IMC, IEEE S&P, USENIX Security. Mar. 2024: Received NSF SFS Award (co-PI). Mar. 2024: Paper on attacking DNS reputation accepted to S&P 2024! Oct. 2023: Presented paper on stale TLS certificates at IMC. Sept. 2023: Received subcontract for DARPA OPS-5G program. Sept. 2023: Joined Dam Nation! (Started at OSU) I am recruiting new Ph.D. students! I have a few funded positions available. Drop me an email with your CV if you're interested in working with me. Please include some indication that your email is not a mass email or AI-generated (the more creative the better!). I‚Äôm Zane, and I study network security and privacy. My research seeks to understand and build systems for authentication and trust on the internet. Current areas of focus include DNS, HTTPS/TLS server authentication, client authentication, and data authenticity. I have also analyzed the security threats related to emerging network technologies: 5G networks, IoT botnets, cryptocurrency/blockchain abuse, etc. Select publications (All publications) Stale TLS Certificates: Investigating Precarious Third-Party Access to Valid TLS Keys Zane Ma, Aaron Faulkenberry, Thomas Papastergiou, Zakir Durumeric, Michael D. Bailey, Angelos D.
